scripts.create-local-package: pnpm run build && rm -f alextheman-utility-*.tgz && pnpm pack
scripts.create-release-note-major: git pull origin main && alex-c-line create-release-note major
scripts.create-release-note-minor: git pull origin main && alex-c-line create-release-note minor
scripts.create-release-note-patch: git pull origin main && alex-c-line create-release-note patch
scripts.format: pnpm run format-prettier && pnpm run format-eslint
scripts.format-prettier: pnpm run format-prettier-typescript && pnpm run format-prettier-javascript
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint-tsc && pnpm run lint-eslint && pnpm run lint-prettier
scripts.lint-prettier: pnpm run lint-prettier-typescript && pnpm run lint-prettier-javascript
scripts.prepare-local-eslint-plugin: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH=${LOCAL_ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH:-../eslint-plugin}; pnpm --prefix "$ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH" run build && pnpm uninstall @alextheman/eslint-plugin && pnpm install --save-dev file:"$ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH"'
scripts.use-live-eslint-plugin: pnpm run prepare-live-eslint-plugin && pnpm run lint
scripts.use-local-eslint-plugin: pnpm run prepare-local-eslint-plugin && pnpm run lint
